sentences.sContent: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.sCn: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.sContent: What do you want with us, Jesus of Nazareth?
sentences.sCn: 拿撒勒的耶稣，我们与你有什么相干？

sentences.sContent: According to the Christian religion,Jesus Christ resurrected from death.
sentences.sCn: 根据基督教的说法，耶稣基督曾死而复生。

trans.tranOther: Jesus or Jesus Christ is the name of the man who Christians believe was the son of God, and whose teachings are the basis of Christianity
